timeline.message:
Migrate InformationTablesTableInfo to SystemTable

This also changes `tableParameters` from a `Map<String, Object>` to
`Settings`. That avoids some copy operations when we create the
`DocTableInfo` instances and also makes it easier to reason about the
types of the values.

Migrate InformationTablesTableInfo to SystemTable

`Settings`. That avoids some copy operations when we create the

types of the values.

timeline.bodyText: just curious: what caused this change?
timeline.author: seut

replies.bodyText: settings.translog.durability and settings.scheduler.max_merge_count were returned by the expressions but not defined in the schema.
replies.author: mfussenegger
